--- title: "Graphic Design with ggplot2" subtitle: "Concepts of the {ggplot2} Package Pt. 1:
Solution Exercise 1" author: "Cédric Scherer **//** rstudio::conf **//** July 2022" format: revealjs: theme: css/style.scss footer: '**[Cédric Scherer](https::/cedricscherer.com) //** rstudio::conf **//** July 2022' #'rstudio::conf(workshop = "Graphic Design with ggplot2", instructor = "Cédric Scherer")' transition: fade progress: true multiplex: false preview-links: true scrollable: false hide-inactive-cursor: true highlight-style: printing chalkboard: theme: whiteboard boardmarker-width: 4 buttons: true pause: true mainfont: Cabinet Grotesk editor: source knitr: opts_chunk: dev: "ragg_png" retina: 1 dpi: 300 execute: freeze: auto cache: true echo: true fig-width: 5 fig-height: 6 --- ## Exercise 1 ::: question - Explore the TfL bike share data visually:
**create a timeseries of reported bike shares on weekend days** - Highlight day and night encoded by colors and shapes. - Connect the points of each period with lines. - What is the difference between `geom_line()` and `geom_path()`? - Apply your favorite theme to the plot. - Add meaningful labels. - [Bonus: use shape to encode Saturday vs Sunday instead.]{style="color:#5DB699;"} - Save the plot as a vector graphic with a decent plot size. ::: ## Import the Data Set ::: {.cell hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/import-data-exercise_1481932e21041a77e464d86cd94ccd5b'} ```{.r .cell-code} bikes <- readr::read_csv( here::here("data", "london-bikes-custom.csv"), col_types = "Dcfffilllddddc" ) bikes$season <- forcats::fct_inorder(bikes$season) library(tidyverse) ``` ::: ## Scatterplot Counts vs. Date ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-1_6b20dfc5e2e8de20d7a26515203c9ec4'} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-1-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Encode Day Period by Colors and Shapes ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-2_3a8a6a671aa51c4fc669b5df820200ea'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="6,7"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-2-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Add Line ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-3_ccdbc1b417b3e83d495915a584674644'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="9,10,11"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) + geom_line( color = "grey" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-3-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Group Lines by Day Period ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-4_08538eb32deb8bbe72a81fbe3f9a109c'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="10"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) + geom_line( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-4-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Order Layers ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-5_7f1d73eaa33ba074e7e4e28a801c693c'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="5,6,7,8"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_line( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-5-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Use \`geom_path()\` instead ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-6_9801024806bc74f6201133fdb38e07ac'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="5"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_path( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-6-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## \`geom_line()\` vs. \`geom_path()\` ::: {layout-ncol="2"} ::: {.cell hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-comp-path_e1d14c7a5d71a6a8533b0332cabd2e7e'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="3|5,6,7"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = temp_feel, y = count) ) + geom_path( aes(color = day_night) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-comp-path-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ::: fragment ::: {.cell hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-comp-line_1a39e1d9a3727bf4b621882ea6a7f1e4'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="5,6,7"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = temp_feel, y = count) ) + geom_line( aes(color = day_night) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-comp-line-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ::: ::: ## Apply a Theme ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-8_9208e1dd75564258ad6f3579d13c44a7'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="1|1,14|14,15,16,17,18,19,20,21|15,16,17,18|19,20,21"} g <- ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_line( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) g + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-8-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Add Meaningful Labels ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-9_5589c05b0caeec60ead106a1f894fce9'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="2,3,4,5,6,7"} g + labs( x = "Weekend date", y = "Reported bike shares", color = "Part of the Day:" ) + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-9-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Add Meaningful Labels ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-10_b2be2c68babc663f2dc80c1f2cdcf101'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="6"} g + labs( x = "Weekend date", y = "Reported bike shares", color = "Part of the Day:", shape = "Part of the Day:" ) + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-10-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Add Meaningful Labels ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-11_eeb2fb94a954fac25eb509f16eea3ddf'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="5,6"} g + labs( x = "Weekend date", y = "Reported bike shares", color = NULL, shape = NULL ) + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-11-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Save the Plot ::: {.cell hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-12_001f4525ce57609a2af449615f227c0a'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="1,2|1|2"} ggsave(here::here("exercises", "plots", "02_concepts_pt1_ex1.pdf"), width = 9, height = 5, device = cairo_pdf) ``` ::: ![](plots/02_concepts_pt1_ex1.png){fig-align="center" fig-alt="The final plot with an aspect ratio of 9 x 5 inches while using a base_size of 15."} ::: footer ::: ## Bonus: Use Shape to Encode Sat vs Sun ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-bonus_89f2459dc2d4f90dea35da5fb05fc478'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="11"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_line( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = lubridate::day(date) == 6) ) + labs( x = "Weekend date", y = "Reported bike shares", color = NULL, shape = NULL ) + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-bonus-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Bonus: Use Shape to Encode Sat vs Sun ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-bonus-1_45847928f078f095d9a834b1dd781987'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="11"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_line( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = lubridate::wday(date, label = TRUE)) ) + labs( x = "Weekend date", y = "Reported bike shares", color = NULL, shape = NULL ) + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-bonus-1-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Bonus: Use Shape to Encode Sat vs Sun ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-bonus-2_cbc5d6d8645a6be169872b85daf5beff'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="2"} invisible( Sys.setlocale("LC_TIME", "C") ) ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_line( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = lubridate::wday(date, label = TRUE)) ) + labs( x = "Weekend date", y = "Reported bike shares", color = NULL, shape = NULL ) + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-bonus-2-1.png){width=1500} ::: ::: ## Save the Plot ::: {.cell hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-bonus-save_50af4dfcf2e2b56495d5124b98d6440f'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="1,2|1|2"} ggsave(here::here("exercises", "plots", "02_concepts_pt1_ex1_bonus.pdf"), width = 9, height = 5, device = cairo_pdf) ``` ::: ![](plots/02_concepts_pt1_ex1_bonus.png){fig-align="center" fig-alt="The final plot with the bonus encoding saved with an aspect ratio of 9 x 5 inches."} ::: footer :::

<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {

      // dispatch for htmlwidgets
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for reveal
    if (window.Reveal) {
      window.Reveal.addEventListener("slidechanged", function(event) {
        fireSlideChanged(event.previousSlide, event.currentSlide);
      });
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
